snippet: The State Supreme Court held the Legislature in contempt on Thursday for its lack of progress on fixing the way the state pays for public education, but it withheld punishment until after the 2015 session.
abstract: Washington State Supreme Court holds the Legislature in contempt for its lack of progress on fixing the way the state pays for public education, but it withholds punishment until after the 2015 session.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court held the Legislature in contempt on Thursday for its lack of progress on fixing the way the state pays for public education, but it withheld punishment until after the 2015 session.

headline.main: Washington: Legislature Is Held in Contempt Over School Funding
headline.print_headline: Washington: Legislature Is Held in Contempt Over School Funding
